body.name: e.l.f. SKIN Holy Hydration! Face Cream, Moisturizer For Nourishing & Plumping Skin, Infused With Hyaluronic Acid, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 1.76 Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery on orders over $35 shipped by Amazon.
features: POWERFUL HYDRATION BOOST: For a powerful boost of hydration to the face and luminous skin, this award-winning facial moisturizer does it all. It’s packed with skin-loving ingredients that even out skin tone and replenish lost moisture for a firmed up, bouncy complexion.

NOURISHES & PLUMPS SKIN: Key ingredients include Hyaluronic Acid to help moisturize for a plump complexion, Niacinamide to minimize pores & even out skin tone, Squalane to improve balance & elasticity, and Vitamin B5 to soothe & hydrate skin.
FOR EVERYONE: Good for normal, dry, combo and oily skin types.
USE DAY & NIGHT: Great for daytime and nighttime use, the non-greasy face cream quickly sinks into the skin for a smooth, super-soft feel.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan.
body.description: The Holy Hydration! Face Cream is your secret weapon to a flawless face. It's packed with skin-loving ingredients to nourish your complexion. Hyaluronic Acid helps provide hydration by locking in moisture and reducing water loss. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) helps brighten and even out skin tone. Squalane helps improve moisture balance and elasticity. Peptides help promote collagen for a more refreshed complexion. This nourishing yet lightweight cream instantly sinks into the skin for a smooth, non-greasy feel and soft, supple skin. e.l.f. makes the best of beauty accessible to every eye, lip, and face. Your originality is infinite, and we are inspired by what makes you unique. From the early explorer to the trend-obsessed beauty junkie - glam or bare faced, minimalist, maximalist and every look in between - we are for every eye, lip, and face. Proud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Poreless Putty Primer 16HR Camo Concealer Holy Hydration! Face Cream - Fragrance Free Lip Lacquer Why We Love This: The ultimate skin perfecting face primer that grips makeup for all-day wear & a flawless finish. A crease-proof liquid concealer that provides 16-hour full coverage with a matte finish. A lightweight moisturizer that nourishes & plumps skin while delivering lasting hydration. A vitamin-enriched lip gloss that brings on a sheer wash of color & high-octane shine. Key Ingredients: Squalane Avocado Oil, Kaolin Clay Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, Peptides, Squalane, Vitamin B5 Vitamin A, Vitamin E

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great pregnancy safe moisturizer. Has no fragrance smell, is thick, and very Creamy! Highly recommend to those wanting a moisturizer that does a wonderful job and doesn't break the bank!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s super light weight and I don’t feel greasy after using it. The product is very moisturizing and has been great for my skin. The price is also unbeatable. Cannot recommend it enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer and not irratating
reviews.reviewText: Feels good on skin, not tacky and doesn't irratate my very sensitive skin. I find E.L.F products of good quality in general and always a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great face cream
reviews.reviewText: Out of all the face lotions I've been trying lately this one has been one of my favorites.I have skin issues and I'm on meds/skin cream to help with it so I think I'm a bit particular about my face lotion.I tried it out because it's technically a face cream and I wanted something that would hopefully be more moisturizing. And this checks that box.It claims to be help "plump" your skin, I don't know what that means and I don't know if I've ever seen that effect, but like I said earlier... skin issues.It does have a scent, which I almost didn't use it because I try to stick to fragrance free. But it's not terribly overpowering.I think it works great, I can apply it a couple times a day, if needed, without it making my skin worse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love how hydrating this is. It's not sticky, it doesn't have a smell, and it rubs in beautifully. Will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good clean moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because Angie from Hot & Flashy recommended it and it did not disappoint! I have very sensitive skin and have to be careful of scent. This is perfect for night and day for me! It is thick and soothing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This cream saved my face!
reviews.reviewText: Thank you elf for a fantastic cream! I always do thorough research when buying online and moisturizer is no exception since I have severely dry sensitive skin I have to be cautious on what I use. Not only was the delivery quick but so were the results! If you look at the photos the middle picture shows what my face looked like one week ago (the sun does this to me yall!) So I bought some glow recipe toner, another great product, and it cleared up the rash then started using the moisturizer today and as you can see in the first photo my face is cleared up and looks radiant! This is the clearest my face has looked since I don't know when! It feels so good on my skin I can't stop feeling my face ☺ no more redness, itchiness, and no more rash! Go buy this!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and replenishing
reviews.reviewText: I like the feel of this moisturizer. Goes on cool and smooths the skin. It does have a little bit of a perfume smell but in the morning my skin feels very moisturized and I love that.

I was looking for a moisturizer that was fragrance, was fairly moisturizing but not too greasy, and had multiple beneficial ingredients. I read a lot of ingredient lists and reviews and settled on this one and I'm so glad I did. The texture is gel-cream and it absorbs completely without being sticky. It doesn't pill my sunscreen or makeup. It is fragrance-free but does not smell bad like some other brands. It contains the same peptides as matrixyl, it has niacinamide, squalane, multiple humectants (glycerine, sodium hyaluronate, etc.), and it feels light on the skin. I'm more prone toward dry skin so I use this day and night. It's a steal for the price.
Wollte mal etwas neues probieren und war damit zufrieden

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic little pot of cream for the price.I am slowly changing all my beauty and skin products to elf.At this price point their products are by far the best.This face cream is my latest purchase and I can’t recommend enough.Light but moisturising with a nice slight perfume.Leaves my skin feeling bright and moisturised.Will definitely continue to purchase
Nice enough cream. Smoothes on nice
